channel.title: AbolishHolyrood on The Majority
channel.description: Recent content in AbolishHolyrood on The Majority

item.title: We are NOT ‘stuck with’ devolution
item.description: Today marks the 25th anniversary of the first session of The Scottish Parliament. As expected, a host of insiders, including Scottish Labour politicians, are saying they are proud of what has been achieved, while Scots wonder if those politicians – who are almost all receiving a salary from the Scottish Parliament – have somehow missed the past 25 years. So let’s cast our minds back to 1997 and ask the question that is not being asked: What if legislative devolution was not part of New Labour’s manifesto, and it never happened?
